transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@100..900&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400..900;1,400..900&display=swap");article,aside,b,body,div,fieldset,footer,form,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,header,html,i,img,label,li,nav,ol,p,section,span,sub,sup,u,ul{border:0;font:inherit;margin:0;padding:0;vertical-align:baseline}article,aside,footer,header,nav,section{display:block}ol,ul{list-style:none}body{color:#333;font-family:Inter,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;line-height:1.2}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p{margin-bottom:1rem}h1{font-size:3.75rem}h1,h2{font-family:Playfair Display,sans-serif}h2{font-size:2.25rem}h3{font-size:1.85rem}h3,h4{font-family:Playfair Display,sans-serif}h4{font-size:1.55rem}h5{font-family:Playfair Display,sans-serif;font-size:1.25rem}h6{font-size:1rem}p{line-height:1.5rem}b{font-weight:700}i{font-style:italic}a{border-bottom:2px solid transparent;font-weight:500;padding:.5rem 0;text-decoration:none}a,a:focus,a:link,a:visited{color:#252323}a:hover{border-bottom:2px solid #f79d84;color:#f79d84}.sub-heading{font-weight:100;letter-spacing:.1rem}.description-header{font-size:.8rem;font-weight:500;letter-spacing:.1rem;text-transform:uppercase}.lead{font-weight:600}.text-1-col{display:flex;flex-direction:row;gap:2rem;padding:5rem 2rem;width:calc(100% - 4rem)}.text-1-col.theme-dark{background-color:#252323;color:#fefcfb}.text-1-col.theme-dark .content-container .button{background-color:#fefcfb;border:2px solid #fefcfb;color:#252323}.text-1-col.theme-dark .content-container .button:hover{color:#fefcfb}.text-1-col.theme-color-1{background-color:#f79d84;color:#252323}.text-1-col.theme-color-2{background-color:#34af9f;color:#fefcfb}.text-1-col.theme-color-2 .content-container .button{background-color:#fefcfb;border:2px solid #fefcfb;color:#252323}.text-1-col.theme-color-2 .content-container .button:hover{color:#fefcfb}.text-1-col.align-left .content-container{align-items:flex-start}.text-1-col.align-centre .content-container{align-items:center}.text-1-col.align-right .content-container{align-items:flex-end}.text-1-col .content-container{align-items:center;display:flex;flex-direction:column;padding:1rem 2rem;width:100%}.text-1-col .content-container .button{background-color:#252323;border:2px solid #252323;color:#fefcfb;margin-top:1rem;padding:.5rem 1.5rem;transition:.3s;width:-moz-fit-content;width:fit-content}.text-1-col .content-container .button:hover{background-color:transparent;color:#252323;transition:.3s}
